checkerList.name: USEEP for Critical Secure Coding
checkerList.description: usleep(useconds_t usec) function can affect system performance, if usec parameter set too shortly. VD recommend that you use more than 10000 ms of usleep function.

checkerList.name: Vector Erase Function Misuse
checkerList.description: Avoid vector erase function inside iterative block;

checkerList.name: Signed Unsigned Assignment Error
checkerList.description: A Signed data type is transformed into a larger Unsigned data type. This can produce unexpected values.

checkerList.name: Checking Free Statement for a return object
checkerList.description: You should have free statement for a returned object by calling ${methodName}

checkerList.name: Checking Free Statement for a parameter object
checkerList.description: You should have free statement for a parameter by calling ${methodName}

checkerList.name: Checking thread unsafe function: dbus-glib
checkerList.description: ${methodName}: dbus-glib is thread unsafe function. so VD recommends NOT to use dbus-glib in the multi-thread environment

checkerList.name: Checking usage of DUID
checkerList.description: ${idName} is used. You need to check usage and the purpose of ID system. please refer to Samsung Smart TV Service Device Identifier Guideline

checkerList.name: Checking usage of returned value of atoi() as an index of array
checkerList.description: atoi() couldreturned return negative value(return type is integer value). do Not use returned value of atoi() as array index without checking its range

checkerList.name: Checking Free Statement for a parameter object
checkerList.description: You should have free statement for a parameter by calling ${methodName}

checkerList.name: Checking array index out of bounds
Checking array index out of bounds
Do-While bracket check
checkerList.description: In the do-while statement, {} shall be always used
